description: Comprehensive veterinary services including online and in-person consultations, and Vet on Call for home visits.

faqs.question: How can I book an online consultation with a vet?
faqs.answer: You can book an online consultation through the Petofy platform by selecting a convenient time and choosing a veterinarian from the list provided.

faqs.question: What types of veterinary services are available?
faqs.answer: Services include general health check-ups, vaccinations, emergency care, and specialized treatments.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency veterinary services?
faqs.answer: Yes, Petofy provides 24/7 emergency veterinary services. You can call our hotline for immediate assistance.

additional_info.title: Vet on Call
additional_info.details: Our Vet on Call service allows you to get veterinary care for your pet in the comfort of your home.

additional_info.title: Specialized Treatments
additional_info.details: We offer specialized treatments for chronic conditions and complex medical cases.
